articles.description: Former Infosys CFO TV Mohandas Pai questions the Karnataka government's decision to sponsor the Scotland and Ireland cricket teams in the T20 World Cup. Pro-Kannada activists, however, argue that if Amul can sponsor cricket teams, then why not Nandini?
articles.content: Hours after Moneycontrol's report that the Karnataka Milk Federation (KMF), which markets its dairy products under the Nandini brand, would sponsor the Scotland and Ireland teams for the T20 Cricket … [+3776 chars]
